sentences: Võltsid lubadused ei toeta alati tõde.
Näitleja kannab võltse habemeid ja juukseid.
context: The Estonian word 'võlts' is an adjective that means fake, false, hypocritical, spurious, or artificial. It's used to describe something that is not genuine, authentic, or sincere - whether it's emotions (fake laughter/sadness), promises (false promises), objects (artificial beards/hair/fake gems), or documents (counterfeit money/passports). The word can refer to both physical things being counterfeit and behaviors/expressions being insincere.
